item.description:
"Gather some friends and join in the fun of an exclusive shopping and wine tasting event in downtown New Haven"

The Broadway and Chapel Merchants are inviting all interested people for a fun evening of wine and shopping.

The evening is set-up as follows:
5:00-6:00 - Free Hors D'Oeuvres at The Study Hotel on Chapel Street.
It is here that all participants will receive a free "Flights of Fancy" wine glass and a map showing the more than 15 downtown stores who are part of the evening.

6:00-8:00 - People follow the map to the particiapting stores of their choice, where they can sample a selection of wine, and if so inclined enjoy 25% off any in-store purchase.

8:00-9:00 - Return to The Study for free coffee and dessert.

Please note that pre-registration is required for this event. To register please email:
info@downtownnewhaven.com
Also, there is a $5.00 registration fee that must be paid at The Study in order to recieve your wine glass and map.

For more information regarding this event, please see here


NHC contact for the evening:
Jeanie: 860-942-4708
item.name: Flights of Fancy
